description: 日本最大のフリマアプリ「メルカリ」を運営。累計出品数40億品を突破し月間2300万人以上が利用。メルペイ（決済）やメルコイン（暗号資産）などFintech事業も展開。「Go Bold」「All for One」「Be a Pro」のバリューのもと世界50カ国以上出身の多様なエンジニアが活躍。2024年にはオンデマンドワークサービス「メルカリ ハロ」をローンチ。
description_en: Operates Japan's largest flea market app "Mercari". Surpassed 4 billion cumulative listings with over 23 million monthly users. Also expands into Fintech with Merpay (payments) and Mercoin (cryptocurrency). Diverse engineers from over 50 countries thrive under the values of "Go Bold," "All for One," and "Be a Pro." Launched on-demand work service "Mercari Hallo" in 2024.
